recipe.title: One-pan Chicken Sausage & Veggies Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 4 cups ; wild rice, cooked, to serve ; (920 g)

steps.step: Place the squash and zucchini on a baking sheet. Evenly coat with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Push the squash and zucchini to the sides and place the chicken sausage in the middle.
Bake for 15 minutes, or until the zucchini and squash are tender.
Serve with wild rice. Eat immediately or refrigerate in airtight container up to 3-4 days.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Place the squash and zucchini onto a baking tray.
Evenly coat with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Spread squash and zucchini to the sides and place chicken sausage in the middle.
Bake for 15 minutes, or until zucchini and squash are cooked through.
Serve now with wild rice, or refrigerate in airtight container up to 3-4 days.
